description:
Elyrion Skin
The special Midnight skin for Elyrion allows you to create graves, build crypts, and summon demons from the graves in the dark forests. 

This group of Elyrion has been corrupted by the Shard of D’Naeh, a mystical relic fueled by darkness. They’ve set their twisted hearts on spreading their influence across the Square with the help of vicious wolves, fiendish ghouls, and tainted dragons!

The Midnight cult has been corrupted by the Shard of D’Naeh, a mystical relic fueled by darkness. Through necromancing practices they can summon demons from the graves in the dark forests.
name: Midnight Skin (Elyrion)
